variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: DCT7
variable.description: Where did the decedent die?

variable.name: DCT8
variable.description: If decedent died in hospital:

variable.name: DCT10
variable.description: Was this a coroner's or medical examiner's case?

variable.name: DCT12
variable.description: Was an autopsy performed?

variable.name: DCT20
variable.description: Code number of person completing this form:

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time

variable.name: FSEQNO
variable.description: Form sequence number

variable.name: LINENO
variable.description: Line number

variable.name: DCT13A
variable.description: Is coding by ICD-9 or ICD-10?

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data

variable.name: DCT4FUT
variable.description: Date of death:
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: DCT19FUT
variable.description: Date form completed:
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: DCT13BFT
variable.description: ICD code for underlying cause of death:
variable.comment: Codes are formatted variables created from original ICD codes that are collapsed into categories. The first two digits indicate the category of the condition; the digits after the decimal point were created for statistical center usage only.
